subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6379: Use a unit's existing stack and version when assigning to a module
text:
Improvement was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 10:45.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6379 >codio-6379< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6379 > Use a unit's existing stack and version when assigning to a module Created by Sean Packham  
When a Unit is created or edited, as soon as the project is selected, it should locate the Project's stack and automatically populate the Stack/Version fields so the user does not have to.

html:
Improvement was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 10:45.

codio-6379 Use a unit's existing stack and version when assigning to a module Created by Sean Packham
When a Unit is created or edited, as soon as the project is selected, it should locate the Project's stack and automatically populate the Stack/Version fields so the user does not have to.
Subtask of codio-5958 Next Up
